text: ninnal strikale vivahameacanam ceytitt avarute avadhi prapiccal avar tannalute bharttakkanmarumayi vivahattil erpetunnatin ninnal tatas'samuntakkarut‌; maryadayanusaricc avar an'yean'yam trptippettittuntenkil. ninnalil ninn allahuvilum antyadinattilum visvasikkunnavarkkulla upadesamanat‌. atan ninnalkk erravum gunakaravum sansud'dhavumayittullat‌. allahu ariyunnu. ninnal ariyunnilla
